name: mcp-user-feedback-server
description: MCP server with user feedback tool that shows dialog boxes

scripts.build: esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --external:child_process --external:fs --external:util --external:process --external:os && echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' | cat - dist/index.js > temp && mv temp dist/index.js && chmod +x dist/index.js
scripts.test:client: tsc test-client.ts --module ES2020 --target ES2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop && node test-client.js
scripts.test:interactive: tsc test-client-interactive.ts --module ES2020 --target ES2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop && node test-client-interactive.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test:client && echo '\nðŸ”„ Running interactive tests...' && npm run test:interactive

author: jeffkit
